SELECT ic.comment_level AS commentLevel, ic.content AS content, ic.sepc_name AS specName, ic.created_time AS createdTime, u.face AS userFace, u.nickname AS nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = ${paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = ${paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.item_name AS itemName, i.id AS itemId, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl , tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN( price_discount ) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
